short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Simplified Chinese pinyin to Chinese text on the page, and to subtitles. Mine content automated Anki card generation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enabling pinyin for Chinese subtitles on pages streaming platforms, with live translation to aid in learning.
Allows for Anki deck creation from web-pages and video streams.
